Prerequisites:
PREREQUISITE: ACG 2071.
SPECIAL FEE. (3 HR. LECTURE)
Course Description:
FUNDAMENTAL PRINCIPLES OF AUDIT PRACTICE AND
PROCEDURE INCLUDING THE VERIFICATION OF BALANCE
SHEETS AND INCOME STATEMENT ITEMS, THE
PREPARATION OF AUDIT WORKING PAPERS, AND THE
COMPILATION OF AUDIT REPORTS. THE COURSE
INCLUDES SHORT PROBLEMS AND AUDIT OF
ACCOUNTING RECORDS.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
